snippet: MATSIL--Milton, 91, on February 8, 2016 at home. He was a kind, generous, good humored man who loved life, his family and long-time companion Marilyn. He is pre-deceased by his wife Annette. He is survived by his daughter Ronnie and son-in-law Gary, his son Paul and daughter-in-law Pamela, his grandchildren Jordan, Remi, Andrew and Jeremy and brother Reggie, his sister-in-law Estelle, and many nieces, nephews, cousins and friends. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MATSIL--Milton, 91, on February 8, 2016 at home. He was a kind, generous, good humored man who loved life, his family and long-time companion Marilyn. He is pre-deceased by his wife Annette. He is survived by his daughter Ronnie and son-in-law Gary, his son Paul and daughter-in-law Pamela, his grandchildren Jordan, Remi, Andrew and Jeremy and brother Reggie, his sister-in-law Estelle, and many nieces, nephews, cousins and friends. 1/3
